overview: Yoo-jin and Myeong-seok receive a phone call from their younger brother Hye-jin in the middle of the night, and Hye-jin, who has suffered from domestic violence, starts living in the same house with her older sister and wife from the next day. Hye-jin feels strange feelings for her brother-in-law, thanks to the tender care of Myeong-seok...
title: little sister-in-law 3
